divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the uffculme river feeld walking my dog when i hurd my dog barking at a tree i egnord it and carryed on walking then she stopt and started to howl then ran to the other side off the field i came to her and put the lead on. I looked around ubuve the tree line and could'nt see eneything so i took another quick glimps before walking on and saw a large disc hovering over head it made no nois or sudon movements it just stade in one spot but when i first saw it i thought that it was a street light after it had gone it made a bright flash and a loud bang like thunder i did'nt feel much after but i did jump when it disapered i had lost sight of the object when it made the noise it had brightend up the sky in a bright white glow i had ran back to the house and told my mum and dad but they did'nt think ennything of it.
Summary: a wide grey disc dull in couler.
